title: (0xc0000005) Application Problem
body: So every time I try to open up the league client, a window pops up and it says "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000005). Click OK to close the application". I've looked everywhere on google about this problem but I haven't figured a way to solve this problem. If anyone knows the solution to this problem, can you please help me?

replies.body: Typically those 005 errors can point to your OS blocking the program when it doesn't recognize it as being safe. Make sure to double check that you have all the right [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) in place, but hit me back up if that doesn't help!
